#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType GolfClub.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CGolfClub GolfClub]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfClub (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Descriptive elements for a golf club.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `type`=golfml:GolfClubTypeEnum>
            ( manufacturer, model, submodel, number?, serial?, loft?, lie?, weight?, swing-weight?, shaft?, grip?, distance`*`   )
  </...>
----
  		      
=== Attributes ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* || *Use* || *Default* || *Fixed* || *Form* ||
|| type ||  				Type of golf club.			 || golfml:GolfClubTypeEnum || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| distance ||  					Average distance and shot type covered by a ball hit by this club on a given date.				 || golfml:ClubDistance ||
|| grip ||  					Grip of club (manufacturer + model).				 || golfml:Equipment ||
|| lie ||  					Lie of the golf club.				 || golfml:Angle90 ||
|| loft ||  					Loft of the golf club.				 || golfml:Angle90 ||
|| manufacturer ||  					Manufacturer of a golf club.				 || xs:string ||
|| model ||  					Model of a golf club.				 || xs:string ||
|| number ||  					Number or name of a club in a set.				 || xs:string ||
|| serial ||  					Serial number of the golf club.				 || xs:string ||
|| shaft ||  					Shaft of the golf club.				 || golfml:Shaft ||
|| submodel ||  					Sub model or type of a golf club.				 || xs:string ||
|| swing-weight ||  					Swing weight of the golf club.				 || golfml:SwingWeight ||
|| weight ||  					Weight of the golf club.				 || xs:float ||
